Name: Average time from Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation to SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Total time between Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation and SW-Reviewer Agreed across all variants containing both activities
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Minimum time it takes to reach SW-Reviewer Agreed after Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation in variants that include a complete reviewer assignment path
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average cycle time of Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation when followed by SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion versus when followed directly by Manuscript Export Succeeded
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion'

Name: Time elapsed from Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation to SW-Reviewer Agreed in variants that involve reviewer reminders (e.g., Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 or 2) compared to variants without such reminders
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Total resolution time of Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation measured until the first occurrence of SW-Reviewer Agreed in multi-round revision cases
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average waiting time between Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation and the start of any reviewer-related activity (e.g., SW-Initial Reviewer Selection or SW-AE Assign Reviewers)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection'

Name: Minimum time between Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation and SW-Reviewer Agreed in high-performance variants (performance < median variant duration)
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Elapsed time from Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation to SW-Reviewer Agreed in variants where Plagiarism Percent Match Threshold Exceeded occurs versus those where it does not
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'
